product_name: L'OrealPlump Ambition pH Hyaluron Lip Oil
summary: SummaryL'Or√©al Plump Ambition pH Hyaluron Lip Oil has a color shifting, glass-like shine with a lasting tint of unique pink. 24HR hydration and plumper-looking lips.
details: DetailsBenefitsLip nourishing formula provides 24HR hydrating careColor shifting formula adapts to your lips pH and transforms to a hue of pink unique to you, leaving a lasting tintInfused with Hyaluronic Acid and Tripeptides for instantly smoother, plumper-looking lipsVolumizing Glass-like shine in a lightweight, non-stick formulaCushiony pillow applicator with massaging beads caress lips for luxurious applicationKey IngredientsInfused with 2% Hyaluronic Acid and Tripeptides for instantly smoother, plumper-looking lipsItem 2640425How To UseUsing the cushiony pillow applicator, apply starting in the center of your upper lip. Work from the center to outer edges of your lips and then glide across the entire bottom lip. Wait for at least 10 minutes to assess your unique color and glassy, plumper-looking lips!IngredientsC18-36 Acid Triglyceride, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Polybutene, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Diisostearyl Malate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate [Nano] / Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Vanillin, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Menthol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tribehenin, Vanillyl Butyl Ether, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Propylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Sorbitan Isostearate, Trihydroxystearin, Sodium Saccharin, Mentha Piperita Oil / Peppermint Oil, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Alumina, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Lactic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Magnesium Silicate, Silica, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Limonene, Tin Oxide, Glucomannan, Aluminum Hydroxide. May Contain: CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, CI 45410 / Red 27, Mica, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides, CI 45410 / Red 28 Lake, CI 42090 / Blue 1 Lake, CI 45380 / Red 22 Lake, CI 19140 / Yellow 5 Lake, CI 15985 / Yellow 6 Lake, CI 17200 / Red 33 Lake, CI 15850 / Red 6, CI 15850 / Red 7. (F.I.L. N70058282/1).
how_to_use: Using the cushiony pillow applicator, apply starting in the center of your upper lip. Work from the center to outer edges of your lips and then glide across the entire bottom lip. Wait for at least 10 minutes to assess your unique color and glassy, plumper-looking lips!
ingredients: Silica Dimethyl Silylate [Nano] / Silica Dimethyl Silylate

reviews.headline: Incredibly moisturizing
reviews.comments: I love this product and make sure to add it after my lip combo EVERY TIME! It has a cooling effect and blends my lip combo colors beautifully. Also a huge plus is the wand which makes it incredibly easy to apply!

reviews.headline: I love this so much
reviews.comments: I was gifted this product from L'Or√©al Paris in exchange for an honest review. This lip oil has such an effective plumping effect. The tint it leaves lasts for so long, even after eating and showering.

reviews.headline: I would repurchase!!
reviews.comments:
I like this product!! It applies great and adds the most perfect gloss-look to my lips. The pH color is almost instantly shows, along with the tingling for the plumpness. This great of a product for this cheap of a price is hard to come by! 
I was gifted this product by L'Oreal Paris in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.headline: Perfect For On The Go!
reviews.comments:
I love that this gloss doesn't have TOO much of a "burning" sensation but still gives a really nice plump. The color is also perfect to throw in your bag on the go! 

I was gifted this product by L'Or√©al Paris in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.headline: Pretty Colors
reviews.comments: Really Pretty Colors! Love the feel of the gloss.  I would reccomend.

reviews.headline: LOVEEE the gloss
reviews.comments: The formula is not sticky and comfortable to wear all day. It changes according to your pH level and this has been my go-to lippie to carry with me all around as someone who has dry lips. I was gifted this product by L'Or√©al Paris in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.headline: Pretty Good!
reviews.comments: I was gifted this product by L'Or√©al Paris in exchange for an honest review. I am not a huge fan of lip plumping gloss but since this is an oil I actually didnt mind it at all. It didnt feel sticky on my lips or look overly glossy

reviews.headline: Might go-to everyday lip oil
reviews.comments: I've been reaching for the L'Or√©al Plump Ambition pH Hyaluron Lip Oil nonstop, and it honestly surprised me with how good it is. The texture is so smooth and cushiony‚Äîzero stickiness, which makes it super comfortable to wear all day. What I really love is how it reacts with my lips to give the prettiest natural tint, so it looks like I put effort into my look even when I didn't. The hyaluronic acid makes my lips feel soft and hydrated, and I actually notice a difference even after the shine wears off. It gives a plumped effect that's flattering but not over-the-top or uncomfortable, just a healthy, juicy look. I do reapply after eating or drinking, but I don't even mind because it layers beautifully without feeling heavy. For me, it's the perfect mix of lip care and gloss, and it definitely feels more high-end than the price.

reviews.headline: Loved
reviews.comments:
I was gifted this product by L'Or√©al Paris in exchange for an honest review. The Plump Ambition Gloss in Cirtial Ice instantly caught my attention with its sleek tube and shimmer. On application, it goes on smooth and lightweight without feeling sticky, which is a big win for a gloss.

The shade Cirtial Ice is gorgeous a sheer, icy shimmer that makes my lips look fresh and luminous on its own, and it also layers beautifully over lipstick for extra dimension. The plumping effect is subtle but noticeable, giving my lips a fuller look without the uncomfortable burning or tingling some glosses have.

reviews.headline: amazing!!
reviews.comments: L'Or√©al Paris Plump Ambition is a game-changer! It gives a smooth, glossy finish while instantly plumping lips without that harsh sting. Lightweight, hydrating, and perfect for everyday wear. The shine lasts, and the colors are super flattering‚Äîdefinitely a must-have in your makeup bag! I recieved this product as a gift.

reviews.headline: loveee
reviews.comments: I tried the L'Or√©al Plump Ambition Lip Oil and I really like it! It makes my lips feel super soft and gives them a shiny, glossy look without feeling sticky. I also love the slight tingling it's not too strong, just enough to feel like it's working. My lips look a little fuller, and the color is light and pretty. It also keeps my lips feeling hydrated for hours.

reviews.headline: very pretty!
reviews.comments: I was gifted this product by L'Oreal Paris in exchange for an honest review. Overall, I do really like this product and love the color it turns out to be after the pH change. However, the formula seems to feel thick and heavy on my lips as opposed to glossy and smooth.

reviews.headline: New Fav Lip Oil
reviews.comments:
I was gifted this product from L'Oreal Paris in exchange for an honest review.

I received this lip oil in "Cristal" which goes on clear. I love the tingly feeling of this lip oil, but what I love even more is the color changing aspect which turned to a pretty pink/red on my lips. I wore it again with a black lipliner and as a black female, I never tried to wear red lip combos because I didn't like how it looked on me. This lip oil made my red lip look SO tea, I'm so excited to pair it with diff lip combos ü•π

reviews.headline: I would repurchase over and over!
reviews.comments: I was gifted this product by L'Oreal in exchange for my honest review. This is my favorite lip oil, it plumps and makes my lips look so juicy, and the pH shade is actually beautiful. I know a lot of pH products have that really ugly, neon, pink color, but this is the perfect shade! I will definitely be rep purchasing this.

reviews.headline: Loveeee this product
reviews.comments:
"I was gifted this product by L'Or√©al Paris in exchange for an honest review."
I really enjoyed this balm-lipstick! Cristal Ice gives a sheer, shimmery glow that's perfect for everyday wear. It feels super hydrating and comfortable. It does fade a bit after eating, but it's easy to reapply. Great for a natural, glossy look!

reviews.headline: SO Hydrating and Non-Sticky
reviews.comments:
I was gifted this product by L'Or√©al Paris in exchange for an honest review, and it has truly become my secret weapon during sorority recruitment.
With long days full of talking, meeting new people, and trying to feel like the most polished version of myself, this gloss has been in my bag every single day. It gives the prettiest shine, feels super hydrating, and lasts way longer than I expected ‚Äî even through all the coffee and constant chatting.
What I love most is that it makes me look put-together without feeling like I'm overdoing it, which is exactly what I need when I'm running from round to round. Whether you're going through recruitment or just want something easy and pretty for everyday wear, this gloss is such a good go-to.

reviews.headline: Review
reviews.comments: I was gifted by L'Or√©al Paris in exchange for a review. The product feels super hydrating without being sticky, and the tint adjusts to a really flattering rosy color on my lips. I like it!

reviews.headline: Great Pigmentation and Plump!
reviews.comments: I was gifted this product by L'Oreal in exchange for an honest review. I've been using this product for a couple weeks now and the way I would describe it is soft formula, pretty pink pigment, and really hydrating! I loved the plump it gave my lips while also leaving a cute color. I love that it does so much for my lips on its own and I am always on the go so having this in my bag became a MUST!

reviews.headline: So gorg!
reviews.comments:
I was gifted this product by¬†L'Or√©al Paris in exchange for an honest review.
This gloss is just what I need for back to school! It keeps my lips hydrated and plumped all throughout the day, and it has a very nice longevity to it! Would definitely recommend! Its color is also beautiful and I love how it matches to the organic lip color as well!

reviews.headline: So gorg!
reviews.comments: This gloss is just what I need for back to school! It keeps my lips hydrated and plumped all throughout the day, and it has a very nice longevity to it! Would definitely recommend! Its color is also beautiful and I love how it matches to the organic lip color as well!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've tried so many lip products- oils, glosses, balms- but nothing has wowed me quite like the L'Or√©al Paris Plump Ambition Hyaluron pH Lip Oil in Cristal Ice. This isn't just a lip oil; it's a multitasking, glow-boosting, hydration-locking treatment disguised in a sleek, glossy finish.

What makes this lip oil stand out is the pH-reactive color. Cristal Ice applies clear and then reacts to your unique lip chemistry to create the perfect pink color with a healthy glow that looks great on every skin tone. It's your lips, just fresher, healthier, and a lot more vibrant. The shiny finish delivers the high-shine, mirror-like look without any of the weight or stickiness of traditional glosses.  

With hyaluronic acid as a key ingredient, this does not merely sit on lips, it hydrates, smooths and plumps from within, adding softness while maintaining moisture long after I apply it. My lips feel softer and look fuller and stay moisturized for quite a while after I put it on. And unlike other plumping stuff that burns, this one just makes my lips look pillowy and soft in a nice way. No burning, just hydrated and beautiful lips. I love wearing it alone for a no-makeup glow, or layered over a lip liner for a full-on juicy lip look. 

  If you are someone who wants plump, hydrated lips with a natural flush and zero stickiness, then the L'Or√©al Paris Plump Ambition Lip Oil in Cristal Ice is for you  

Gifted by L'Or√©al
faceoff_positive.headline: If you don't have this, you should

faceoff_negative.comments:
I was gifted this product by L'Or√©al Paris in exchange for an honest review.
I love pH adjusting lip gloss so I was very excited to try this one! I was immediately interested in the unique blue tone hue‚Äîhow cool?! My favorite thing about pH adjusting lip gloss is that it gives you a subtle pink tint to your lips. Whether you want a glossy lip or a bit of color across your lips, this could be what you're looking for. Just note that this is a plumping gloss so you will feel it! Personally I don't like the feeling of plumping glosses. However, I could not resist the Cristal Ice shade. Another thing to note is the tube is a bit short so if you're using this everyday, it might run out quicker and if you're on a budget you may want to consider the sizing. Overall, if you're looking for a plumping gloss to bring a bit of tint to your lips, try it out :)
faceoff_negative.headline: Plumping gloss + a natural tint
